305102533.Title: Sharp Carousel 1.8 cu. ft. 1100W Countertop Microwave Oven in Stainless Steel (ISTA 6 Packaging)

The easy-to-clean brushed stainless steel finish with scratch-resistant glass door complements your style. With decades of experience designing smart innovative microwaves, its easy to see why home cooks throughout the world trust Sharp Carousel.

314248987.Title: Willz 1.6 cu. ft. Modern Countertop Microwave with Sensor Cooking in True Stainless Steel, Silver
314248987.Description: The Willz 1.6 cu. ft. microwave oven in true stainless steel is an excellent choice for home or office use. Six cooking functions provide easy, one-touch operation. 11 variable power levels offer convenient programs to simplify cooking.

311537343.Title: Midea 0.9 cu. ft. 1000-Watt Commercial Countertop Microwave Oven in Stainless Steel, Silver
311537343.Description: The Midea commercial microwave is one of the most essential pieces of equipment for any restaurant, concession stand, fast food establishment or cooking operation. It is perfect for heating up soup, cooking enter's or even steaming vegetables. There is no other piece of equipment like a microwave oven and the Midea commercial microwaves will help complete all heating and prep needs for any foodservice application. Midea is the largest manufacturer of microwaves in the world and have several different commercial models ranging from 1000-Watt to 2100-Watt. Color: Stainless Steel.

302322848.Title: Whirlpool 1.6 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave in Fingerprint Resistant Stainless Steel with 1,200-Watt Cooking Power
302322848.Description: This Whirlpool brand countertop microwave delivers convenient features that are easy to use no matter who's doing the cooking. Sensor cooking automatically adjusts the cook time so there's no need to guess. The 1,200-Watt microwave cooks food quickly and evenly and a recessed glass turntable makes room for larger items. From sides to snacks, enjoy fitting cooking into any schedule. Color: Fingerprint Resistant Stainless Steel.

302477099.Title: KitchenAid 1.5 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave in Stainless Steel, Silver
302477099.Description: This versatile convection countertop microwave brings virtually any recipe within your reach. 1000-Watt microwave and 1400-Watt convection elements combine to cook with microwave speed, roast evenly and sear like conventional ovens. Six quick-touch preset modes eliminate guesswork. The 13-1/2 in. turntable is recessed to maximize the 1.5 cu. ft. capacity. 30 in. or 27 in. Trim Kits provide a sleek built-in look when paired with a single wall oven. Color: Stainless Steel.

308798835.Title: Cafe 1.5 cu. ft. Smart Countertop Convection Microwave Oven in Stainless Steel with Sensor Cooking, Silver
308798835.Description: One look at the Cafe kitchen and you'll feel as if you've been transported behind the scenes of your favorite casual dining experience. Each appliance has been meticulously designed to create an atmosphere where people like to gather and love to cook. Tough stainless steel and powerful elements complement their robust appearance.

302206530.Title: RCA 1.1 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave in Stainless Steel
302206530.Description: RCA branded 1.1 cu.ft. Microwave with grill function is not just for reheating leftovers and making popcorn. With this Microwave and grill you can create meals and amazing dishes without the use of a full size oven. The grill function browns food & gives it an attractive and tasting grilled appearance and texture. With its 10 power levels to grill it will meet all your culinary needs. It also has all the functionality of a regular microwave oven. its sleek and stylish design will compliment any kitchen. Color: Stainless.

301349476.Title: Samsung 1.9 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave with Sensor Cook in Stainless Steel, Silver

314699305.Title: Galanz 1.6 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave ExpressWave in Stainless Steel with Sensor Cooking Technology, Silver
314699305.Description: Galanz thoughtful engineering brings you ExpressWave with Inverter technology for faster cooking, reheating, and defrosting. This 1100-Watt Microwave Oven with Sensor Cooking and Sensor Reheating features as well as a unique Express Cooking Knob that makes everything faster and easier to use. It's the perfect microwave oven for cooking faster everyday meals as well as gourmet cooking. Color: Stainless Steel.

302206884.Title: Samsung 1.4 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave with Sensor Cook in Stainless Steel, Silver

307323509.Title: Panasonic 0.8 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave in Stainless Steel with Inverter Technology, Silver
307323509.Description: Panasonic Inverter technology perfects the art of cooking with microwave ovens, delivering delicious flavor, excellent color, superb shape and texture in the foods you cook. The consistent delivery of microwave energy means delicate foods can simmer without the edges and surfaces overcooking. Foods have the look and taste you expect - without the wait. Panasonic has succeeded in evolving the Turbo Defrost, which allows you to defrost foods even faster than previous Panasonic Auto Defrost. Panasonic Inverter Defrost technology is an advanced microwave sequencing system using the inverter continuous-power delivery feature. Color: Stainless Steel.

302944125.Title: GE Profile 2.2 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave in White with Sensor Cooking
302944125.Description: GE Profile products offer the best in contemporary design matched with the latest in appliance technologies to transform the way you live. 312290841.Title: Panasonic 1.6 cu. ft. Built-In / Countertop Microwave Oven in Stainless Steel with Inverter Technology, Silver
312290841.Description: When it comes to everything you expect in a microwave, nothing compares with the defrosting, cooking and reheating efficiency of Panasonic's Cyclonic Wave microwave oven. At every temperature level it circulates heat by way of precision, ultra-efficient 3D waves for easier, more versatile food preparation, even with denser, more complex food textures. Patented Inverter Technology delivers a seamless stream of cooking power even at low settings. Not only are foods prepared more quickly across a variety of cooking techniques, you can cook, poach, braise and steam foods to perfection, while also preserving the essential vitamins and nutrients you want in your meals. Put together, Cyclonic Wave with Inverter Technology provides the fastest, most efficient way to prepare and enjoy more flavorful snacks, sides, and meals with perfectly cooked edges and fully heated centers at all temperature levels. It's the ultimate combination in advanced microwave cooking today. Color: stainless steel.

308905138.Title: Oster Countertop Microwave Stainless Steel Silver 1.6 cu. ft. 1000-Watt with Push Button, Stainless Steel Trim/Silver Cabinet
308905138.Description: With six touch cook options and 10 power levels, this microwave oven fits your modern kitchen and offers a variety of menu choices to complement your cooking tastes and style. This Countertop Microwave makes cooking and reheating meals or beverages simple, quick, and convenient. With a capacity of 1.6 cu. ft., this countertop microwave is perfect for any kitchen. Color: Stainless Steel Trim/Silver Cabinet.

312632077.Title: Toshiba 1.5 cu. ft. Countertop Small Convection Microwave in Stainless Steel, Silver
312632077.Description: This Toshiba 1.5 cu. ft. 1000-Watt Stainless Steel microwave convection oven has a spacious interior and features convection and microwave cooking. Choose from ten power levels up to 1000-Watts and convection cooking from 170°F to 425°F. Program up to three favorite time and power combinations for additional 1-touch convenience. The Stainless Steel exterior looks good in any kitchen and is easy to clean.

305708078.Title: Magic Chef 1.1 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave in Black with Gray Cavity

301664271.Title: LG Electronics NeoChef 1.5 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave in Stainless Steel with Smart Inverter, Silver

205574244.Title: Samsung 1.4 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave with PowerGrill in Stainless Steel, Silver
205574244.Description: The Samsung countertop microwave oven brings fresh, modern design to any kitchen. It features a shiny mirror design that sets it apart from traditional microwaves. 203537434.Title: Frigidaire 1.1 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave in Stainless Steel, Silver
203537434.Description: Frigidaire's 1.1 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave offers versatility with 10 cooking power levels for great results. The microwave features an effortless defrost option that makes it easy to quickly and evenly defrost almost anything, while the multi-stage cooking option lets you program power levels and cooking times in advance for custom functionality. For additional convenience, the easy-set start lets you quickly start cooking from one to six minutes with just the touch of a button to save time. Color: Stainless Steel.

302326000.Title: Whirlpool 2.2 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave in Fingerprint Resistant Stainless Steel with 1,200-Watt Cooking Power
302326000.Description: This Whirlpool brand countertop microwave delivers convenient features that are easy to use no matter who's doing the cooking. From sides to snacks, enjoy fitting cooking into any schedule. Color: Fingerprint Resistant Stainless Steel.

310997709.Title: Galanz 1.2 cu. ft. Countertop ToastWave 4-in-1 Convection Oven, Air Fry, Toaster Oven, Microwave in Stainless Steel, Stainless Steel and Black Combination
310997709.Description: Galanz thoughtful engineering brings you ToastWave the first countertop appliance with 4-in-1 multi-functionality: a combination air fryer, convection oven, microwave and toaster oven. You will love how the generous 1.2 cu.ft. capacity gives you plenty of room to create family-sized meals. TotalFry 360° technology lets you air fry with little or no oil for healthier, crunchy fried favorites like chicken, shrimp, wings, French fries even bacon. The unique easy clean air fry kit provides more frying surface area with better air circulation compared to traditional air fryers. Designed with an internal fan plus an additional heating element, ToastWave's True Convection technology circulates heated air throughout the oven as food spins 360°, cooking your food faster and more evenly without hot spots. Unlike traditional microwave heating systems that pulse on and off, ToastWave's patented Inverter technology creates continuous, constant, even heat to maintain exact temperature during the cooking process. Sensor Cook is equipped with a built-in humidity sensor to ensure that your food is never under or overcooked. When your precooked dishes are hot and ready to eat, Sensor Reheat stops automatically. With ToastWave, there is no need for a standalone toaster oven it toasts your favorite bread, bagels and rolls to golden-brown perfection. Thanks to Galanz thoughtful engineering, ToastWave provides ultimate cooking versatility so you can create gourmet meals and everyday cooking. Color: Stainless Steel and Black Combination.

303100246.Title: PREMIUM 0.7 cu. ft. Counter Top Microwave Oven in Stainless Steel, Silver
303100246.Description: This 0.7 cu. ft. Counter Top Microwave oven with its compact design fits easily on any counter while leaving you plenty of food prep space. Color: Stainless Steel.

306809809.Title: BLACK+DECKER 0.9 cu. ft. Countertop Digital Microwave in Stainless Steel, Silver

The LED display is bright and easy to read, and the handy kitchen timer and clock makes it simple to plan your meal. This countertop microwave oven is a smart and elegant choice for the style and feel of your kitchen. Color: Stainless Steel.

314634239.Title: Panasonic 1.6 cu. ft. Built in or Countertop Microwave Oven in Fingerprint-Proof Stainless Steel, Silver
314634239.Description: Microwaving has evolved. When it comes to everything you expect in a microwave, nothing compares with the defrosting, cooking, and reheating capability of the new Cyclonic Wave. At every temperature level, Cyclonic Wave circulates heat in precision, ultra-efficient 3D waves for easier, more versatile food preparation, even with denser, more complex food textures. This exceptional microwave also includes patented Inverter Technology. Unlike traditional microwaves that rely on pulse-on, pulse-off power at lower temperatures, Inverter Technology delivers a constant stream of cooking power at every temperature. The result. More evenly cooked meals - edges to centers - every time. Put together, Cyclonic Wave with Inverter Technology provides the fastest, most efficient way to enjoy perfectly prepared snacks, sides, and meals across a broader range of cooking techniques, while also maintaining more of the natural nutrients and flavor you want. It's the ultimate combination by Panasonic. Color: stainless steel.

314699304.Title: Galanz 1.3 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave ExpressWave in Stainless Steel with Sensor Cooking Technology, Silver
314699304.Description: Galanz thoughtful engineering brings you ExpressWave with Inverter technology for faster cooking, reheating, and defrosting. It's the perfect microwave oven for cooking faster everyday meals as well as gourmet cooking. Color: Stainless Steel.

303228611.Title: Panasonic 1.2 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave Oven in Stainless Steel Built-In Capable with Sensor Cooking Technology, Silver
303228611.Description: The Panasonic 1.2 cu. ft. 1200-Watt Genius Sensor microwave oven with Inverter Technology is perfect for the countertop or built-in installation. Unlike other microwave ovens, Inverter technology delivers a seamless stream of cooking power, even at lower settings, for precision cooking that preserves the flavor and texture of your favorite foods. With Inverter, you can poach, braise and even steam more delicate foods, all with the speed and convenience of a microwave. With the touch of our Genius Sensor cooking button, this microwave takes guesswork out of creating a great meal by automatically setting power levels and adjusting cooking or defrosting time. The sensor measures the amount of steam produced during cooking and signals the microprocessor to calculate the remaining cooking time at the appropriate power level. Plus with Turbo Defrost, you can thaw foods faster than ever. Color: Stainless Steel.

305708074.Title: Magic Chef 0.9 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave in Stainless Steel with Gray Cavity, Silver
305708074.Description: The Magic Chef 0.9 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave provides ample space for a wide variety of cooking needs. 308547089.Title: Farberware Professional 1.3 cu. Ft. 1000-Watt Countertop Microwave Oven in Stainless Steel, Silver
308547089.Description: The Farberware Pro Microwave delivers power, style and convenience with a sleek, stainless steel design to compliment your kitchen. Multi-stage cooking means that you can set the power level to adjust during the cooking cycle for perfect results without interruption. The LCD display provides a clock and kitchen timer. With a 16.5 in. turntable, this models roomy interior accommodates oversized dinner plates, perfect for a large family gathering. Smart Sensor cooking allows you to prepare preset menu items and reheat foods without overcooking using humidity sensors inside the microwave that determine when the food is ready. An Energy Saver power mode allows you to conserve energy when the microwave is not in active use. 7 One-Touch cooking programs allow you to heat up everyday items in seconds. Amenities such as 1 to 6-minute instant start functions, a +30-Seconds control button, 10 power control levels, and Memory Function take the guesswork out of food prep. 5 Auto-Cook pre-programmed settings including Bacon, Frozen Bread Reheat, Beverage, Chicken, and Oatmeal make you a versatile chef with little effort. The microwave includes 3 Automatic Defrost pre-programmed settings making defrosting your favorite item a cinch. Features such as 4 Melt pre-programmed options, and 3 Soften pre-programmed options set this microwave apart from the rest. Additional features include a blue LED display with kitchen timer and clock as well as a child safety lock function to prevent accidental operation.

309033154.Title: Toshiba 1.1 cu. Ft. Countertop Digital Microwave in Stainless Steel, Silver
309033154.Description: This Toshiba microwave has 1.1 cubic feet of space and 1,000-Watt of cooking strength. The stainless steel exterior and compact size makes this the ideal unit for smaller kitchens, dorms, or office break rooms. It offers 10 different levels of power and features a bright green digital display with LED interior lighting. One-touch buttons help to make the food preparation quick and easy. There are multiple pre-programmed settings including: defrost, express cook, mute mode, and more. Using mute mode, the sound at the end of the cooking cycle can be turned off for quiet operation. Easily open or close the microwave with the large, easy-to grip door handle. If you're looking for an elegant and efficient all-in-one microwave, look no further.

310997711.Title: Galanz 1.6 cu. ft. Countertop SpeedWave 3-in-1 Convection Oven, Microwave with Combi Speed Cooking in Stainless Steel, Silver
310997711.Description: Galanz thoughtful engineering brings you SpeedWave the 3-in-1 countertop air fryer, convection oven and microwave that also includes Combi Speed Cooking option. Faster than either mode alone, the intelligent combination of True Convection and microwave cooking creates delicious dishes with optimum texture and taste. Roast chicken, baked potatoes and frozen entrees can now be ready when you are. The roomy 1.6 cu. ft. oven has plenty of room for family sized meals. TotalFry 360° technology lets you air fry with little or no oil for healthier, crunchy fried favorites like chicken, shrimp, wings, French fries even bacon. The unique easy clean air fry kit provides more frying surface area with better air circulation compared to traditional air fryers. Designed with an internal fan plus an additional heating element, SpeedWave's True Convection technology circulates heated air throughout the oven as food spins 360°, cooking your food faster and more evenly without hot spots. Sensor Cook is equipped with a built-in humidity sensor to ensure that your food is never under- or overcooked. When your precooked dishes are hot and ready to eat, Sensor Reheat stops automatically. Thanks to Galanz thoughtful engineering, SpeedWave provides ultimate cooking versatility so you can create gourmet meals and everyday cooking. Color: Stainless Steel.
